# isLoopingEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the track is in a looping state.

## Declaration

```swift
var isLoopingEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you don’t set [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMusicTrack/loopRange], the framework loops the full track.

## Configuring the Looping State

- **loopRange**: The timestamp range for the loop, in beats.
- **numberOfLoops**: The number of times the track’s loop repeats.
